name: 100 Hidden Cats in China
description:
100 Hidden Cats in China - Join the cutest adventure in the China! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of China Landscape as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game.Can you find them all?

1.20 Levels
2.100 Hidden Cats
3.High Quality Resolution Artworks
4.Beautiful wallpapers
etc...
